EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesCurr.label: Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesCurr.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date, including liabilities incurred and payable to vendors for goods and services received, taxes, interest, rent and utilities, compensation costs, payroll taxes and fringe benefits (other than pension and postretirement obligations), contractual rights and obligations, and statutory obligations.

AccountsReceivableNet.label: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
AccountsReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business.

AccumulatedAmortizationDeferredFinanceCo.label: Accumulated Amortization, Debt Issuance Costs
AccumulatedAmortizationDeferredFinanceCo.description: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs.

AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.description: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivable.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivable.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable.

AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs
AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt issuance costs.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income, attributable to parent entity. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableT.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableT.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income (loss) and other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to noncontrolling interests. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPort.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPort.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

CostOfOtherPropertyOperatingExpense.label: Cost of Other Property Operating Expense
CostOfOtherPropertyOperatingExpense.description: Other operating costs incurred during the reporting period and may include amounts paid to maintain the property.

DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscount.label: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Discount
DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscount.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt discount.

DeferredFinanceCostsNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DepreciationAmortizationAndAccretionNet.label: Depreciation, Amortization and Accretion, Net
DepreciationAmortizationAndAccretionNet.description: The aggregate net amount of depreciation, amortization, and accretion recognized during an accounting period. As a noncash item, the net amount is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

DepreciationAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Nonproduction
DepreciationAndAmortization.description: The current period expense charged against earnings on long-lived, physical assets not used in production, and which are not intended for resale, to allocate or recognize the cost of such assets over their useful lives; or to record the reduction in book value of an intangible asset over the benefit period of such asset; or to reflect consumption during the period of an asset that is not used in production.

DividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Dividends Payable
DividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding.

EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashAndCashEquival.label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash and Cash Equivalents
EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashAndCashEquival.description: Amount of increase (decrease) from the effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalent balances held in foreign currencies.

EquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistrib.label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution
EquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistrib.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return on investment, classified as operating activities. Excludes distribution for return of investment, classified as investing activities.

GainLossOnSaleOfProperties.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Properties
GainLossOnSaleOfProperties.description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of real estate or properties that were intended to be sold or held for capital appreciation or rental income. This element refers to the gain (loss) included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: General and Administrative Expense
GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total of expenses of managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

ImpairmentOfRealEstate.label: Impairment of Real Estate
ImpairmentOfRealEstate.description: The charge against earnings in the period to reduce the carrying amount of real property to fair value.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Equity Method Investments, Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations before deduction of income tax expense (benefit) and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest, and addition of income (loss) from equity method investments.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsInclud.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsInclud.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations including portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments
IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.description: Amount of income (loss) for proportionate share of equity method investee's income (loss).

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in amount due within one year (or one business cycle) from customers for the credit sale of goods and services.

IncreaseDecreaseInOperatingLiabilities.label: Increase (Decrease) in Operating Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInOperatingLiabilities.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of liabilities that result from activities that generate operating income.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash.label: Increase (Decrease) in Restricted Cash
IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with funds that are not available for withdrawal or use (such as funds held in escrow) and are associated with underlying transactions that are classified as investing activities.

IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCashForOpera.label: Increase (Decrease) in Restricted Cash for Operating Activities
IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCashForOpera.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with funds that are not available for withdrawal or use (such as funds held in escrow) and are associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities. This may include cash restricted for regulatory purposes.

InsuredEventGainLoss.label: Insured Event, Gain (Loss)
InsuredEventGainLoss.description: Amount of excess (deficiency) of insurance recovery over the loss incurred from an insured event.

InterestPaid.label: Interest Paid, Including Capitalized Interest, Operating and Investing Activities
InterestPaid.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, including, but not limited to, capitalized interest and payment to settle zero-coupon bond attributable to accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount; classified as operating and investing activities.

InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssoc.label: Investments in and Advance to Affiliates, Subsidiaries, Associates, and Joint Ventures
InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssoc.description: Amount of investment in equity method investee and investment in and advance to affiliate.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

MinorityInterestInLimitedPartnerships.label: Noncontrolling Interest in Limited Partnerships
MinorityInterestInLimitedPartnerships.description: Carrying amount of the equity interests owned by noncontrolling partners of a limited partnership included in the entity's consolidated financial statements.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.description: Adjustment that results from the process of translating subsidiary financial statements and foreign equity investments into the reporting currency of the reporting entity, net of tax.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

PartnersCapital.label: Partners' Capital
PartnersCapital.description: The amount of ownership interest of different classes of partners in limited partnership.

PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Contributions
PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.description: Total contributions made by each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Distributions
PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.description: Total distributions to each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountSaleOfUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Sale of Units
PartnersCapitalAccountSaleOfUnits.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to the sale of units. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalIncludingPortionAttributa.label: Partners' Capital, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
PartnersCapitalIncludingPortionAttributa.description: Amount of partners' capital (deficit), including portions attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

PartnersCapitalOther.label: Partners' Capital, Other
PartnersCapitalOther.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in partners' capital classified as other.

PaymentsForCapitalImprovements.label: Payments for Capital Improvements
PaymentsForCapitalImprovements.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of or capital improvements to properties held for investment (operating, managed, leased) or for use.

PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.label: Payments of Capital Distribution
PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.description: Cash outflow to owners or shareholders, excluding ordinary dividends. Includes special dividends.

PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Noncontrolling Interest
PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends provided by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.label: Payments of Financing Costs
PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Equity Method Investments
PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of or advances to an equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

PaymentsToAcquireOtherPropertyPlantAndEq.label: Payments to Acquire Other Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquireOtherPropertyPlantAndEq.description: Amount of cash outflow from the acquisition of or improvements to long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquireRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire Real Estate
PaymentsToAcquireRealEstate.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it and so forth; includes real estate intended to generate income for the owner; excludes real estate acquired for use by the owner.

PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.label: Payments to Noncontrolling Interests
PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash outflow to a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but not limited to, reduction of noncontrolling interest ownership. Excludes dividends paid to the noncontrolling interest.

ProceedsFromInsuranceSettlementInvesting.label: Proceeds from Insurance Settlement, Investing Activities
ProceedsFromInsuranceSettlementInvesting.description: Amount of cash inflow for proceeds from settlement of insurance claim, classified as investing activities. Excludes insurance settlement classified as operating activities.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartn.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Limited Partners Units
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartn.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common limited partners units during the period.

ProceedsFromOtherDebt.label: Proceeds from Other Debt
ProceedsFromOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromPartnershipContribution.label: Proceeds from Partnership Contribution
ProceedsFromPartnershipContribution.description: The cash inflow from the capital received in cash from a partner in a partnership during the period.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRestrictedCashFi.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Restricted Cash, Financing Activities
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRestrictedCashFi.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from cash and cash items that are not available for withdrawal or usage.

ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.description: The cash inflow from the sale of property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

RealEstateHeldforsale.label: Real Estate Held-for-sale
RealEstateHeldforsale.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of investments in land and buildings held for sale, excluding real estate considered to be inventory of the entity.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedD.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Accumulated Depreciation
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedD.description: The cumulative amount of depreciation for real estate property held for investment purposes.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Net
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.description: Amount of real estate investment property, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.label: Repayments of Other Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RevenueFromLeasedAndOwnedHotels.label: Revenue from Hotels (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
RevenueFromLeasedAndOwnedHotels.description: Amount, net of promotional allowances, of revenue from managing and operating hotels, including, but not limited to, revenue from occupancy, casino, food and beverage, and retail. Excludes operating lease income.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

TemporaryEquityRedemptionValue.label: Temporary Equity, Redemption Value (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
TemporaryEquityRedemptionValue.description: The aggregate amount to be paid by the entity upon redemption of the security that is classified as temporary equity. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.
